br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice
Interface DatastoreFacade

public interface DatastoreFacade

Defines all Datastore Operations. Its assume that all the persistent classes are mapped, and provides only a high level interface for save/restore/remove data from Datastore.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

Field Detail

CURSOR_PROPERTY

static final String CURSOR_PROPERTY
Property name used to store the query's Cursor using ThreadProperties.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

setQueriesMaxSize

void setQueriesMaxSize(int size)
Sets the max size for operations that returns a collection. Number equals or lesser than zero indicates that queries should return all results founded. Its the default behavior.

Parameters:
size - the max size for queries

getMaxQueriesSize

int getMaxQueriesSize()
Gets the max queries' size.

Returns:
the max queries' size.
See Also:
setQueriesMaxSize(int)

saveCursor

void saveCursor(boolean save)
Sets if queries should save cursors for queries. If true for all queries that returns a collection as result, it will saves the cursor at the ThreadProperties using the CURSOR_PROPERTY as key. The default is false;

saveCursor

boolean saveCursor()
Returns:
true if the cursor is being saved, false otherwise.
See Also:
saveCursor(boolean)

detachObjectsOnQuery

void detachObjectsOnQuery(boolean detach)
Indicates if objects restored from datastore will be detached on load. Setting this to true will load all entities on queries, adding an overhead to queries operations. Setting to false objects will not be detached, being accessible only while the PersistenceManager referent to the query is opened. Set it to false if you are using a servlet filter. The default value is true.

Parameters:
detach - true to indicates that a PersistenceManagerFilter will be used, false otherwise.

detachObjectsOnQuery

boolean detachObjectsOnQuery()
Returns:
true if objects are being detached on queries, false otherwise.

deleteObjectsByQuery

<T> void deleteObjectsByQuery(Class<T> klass,
                              String filter)
                          throws DatastoreException

Parameters:
klass - The object's class.
filter - the filter used to select entities do be deleted
